name: Death Rpg
description: Top Down drag & drop RPG strategy game. Help 3 survivor to kill enemies in different worlds.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 8 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce 800 series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Direct x9
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: i7 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 900 series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Direct x9
